Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       He looked down.  "Trinity.  I'm glad you're awake now.  I need you to 
stay at the ship with Uncle Windlord for a little while.  I have to go for a 
little while."  He galloped up to the base and set her down.  He opened a com 
to Windlord.  "Windlord.  I'm dropping off Trinity.  I'm going to look into a 
distress signal.  Nightlight and Starstomp are already on their way.  I hope 
this one turns out well."  He transforms into his giant bird mode and flies 
toward the distress signal.

--part1_6d.19bc8fe3.28c57458_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
